title: How to Learn HTML
content:
How to Learn HTML

  • Start with the Basics: Learn about tags, elements, and attributes.
  • Understand Semantic HTML: Use proper tags like <header>, <article>, and <footer>.
  • Learn Forms and Inputs: Understand <form>, <input>, <select>, and validation attributes.
  • Explore Multimedia: Work with images, videos, and audio.
  • Use Tables and Lists: Organize content efficiently.
  • Work with Links and Navigation: Implement internal and external links.
  • Practice with Small Projects: Create simple web pages.
  • Use Online Resources: Check out MDN Web Docs and W3Schools.
